BELL MANAGER’S OR AUTHORIZED AGENT’S APPROVAL IS REQUIRED PRIOR TO REVERTING TO COST PER HOUR RATES.  • LENGTH OF DRILL IS MEASURED FROM: • PAVED DRIVEWAY: EDGE OF PAVEMENT TO EDGE OF PAVEMENT. • GRAVEL DRIVEWAY: SHOULDER EDGE TO SHOULDER EDGE. • ROADWAYS: WIDTH OF ROAD FROM GRAVELLED SHOULDER TO GRAVELLED SHOULDER. • SIDEWALKS: WIDTH OF TOP SURFACE OF WALKWAY. • IF SUPPLIER MUST BE PAID ADDITIONAL DISTANCE THAN REQUIRED FOR HAND DRILLING, (DUE TO SAFETY REASONS, OR PROTECTION OF CUSTOMER PROPERTY), THE EXTRA LENGTHS MAY BE ADDED TO THE ABOVE LENGTH.    (PREAPPROVED BY BELL MANAGER) • IF SUPPLIER CHOOSES TO LENGTHEN OR USE A LARGER DIAMETER FOR BORING OR FOR CONVENIENCE, IT SHALL BE AT SUPPLIER’S COST. • THIS CODE INCLUDES THE PLACING OF PLASTIC UTILITY PIPE AND OR WIRE/S INTO BORED HOLE. • CAN NOT BE USED WHEN PLOUGHING THROUGH A GRAVEL DRIVEWAY OR SAW CUTTING A PAVED DRIVEWAY.~~METRE~ $19.00 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
